title: Materials used for interior finishes shall not have a flame spread ability rating exceeding Class I, section 3
clause_text: Materials used for interior finishes shall not have a flame spread ability rating exceeding Class I, section 3.4.15.2 and 3.4.15.3 of Part 4 of National Building Code& amended from time to time.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Materials used for interior finishes shall not have a flame spread ability rating exceeding Class I, section 3.4.15.2 and 3.4.15.3 of Part 4 of National Building Code& amended from time to time.
